name: RadioRA 2 Essentials Project Database
summary: Learn about .LUTX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: LUTX files are used by contractors who set up lighting systems for customers. Lutron Electronics only distributes the RadioRA 2 Essentials software to factory-trained installers.
RadioRA Essentials version 2 introduced the LUTX format. Previously the .LUT file extension was used.
NOTE: RadioRA Essentials is no longer available for download.

description: Project file created by RadioRA 2 Essentials, a program used for configuring wireless total home control systems from Lutron Electronics; saves configuration information for temperature and light control in a building; can be deployed to a RadioRA 2 system when complete.
